name: ParinnovCam
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
ParinnovCam skill can only work with certain AC powered Wi-Fi cameras, not all cameras using ParinnovCam APP can use ParinnovCam skill, please consult the sellers if your product can support Alexa before using this skill.

To get started, please follow the steps below:
1. Install ParinnovCam App from App Store and Google Play, connect the camera to ParinnovCam App, keep it online and running.
2. Find ParinnovCam Skill in Alexa App, click "Enable Skill" to link your camera with the Alexa account, then find your camera.
3. Try voice commands like "Alexa, show the living room" to get live videos and check everything's fine in your sweet home.
